name: Selection to Upper/Lower Case
description: Convert selected text to uppercase or lowercase. Say 'make uppercase' or 'make lowercase' while text is selected.
command:
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "c" using {command down}'
sleep 0.1
text=$(pbpaste)
if echo "$FREEWAY_TEXT" | grep -qi "uppercase"; then
    echo "$text" | tr '[:lower:]' '[:upper:]' | pbcopy
else
    echo "$text" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' | pbcopy
fi
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "v" using {command down}'
